titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on porcelain lamp-holder housings containing sockets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
2/12/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on porcelain lamp-holder housings containing sockets.
